projects.name: A Landing page from Front End Mentor
Fantasy Football Archieve
projects.details: A long time fantasy football league needed a website to keep track of stats from past seasons and to add new stats to the league's history.  I developed a user dashboard and interface to easily track the stats the league wanted to display.  In addition to a public website, I created a private admin interface.  The admin can easily add, update, and delete team information at needed.

projects.name: Home Lego Catalog
projects.details: This project serves as a way for families to keep track of their childrens toys, books, or anything else that needs to be tracked.  It is a public facing website a user can easily sort through to see what the family has.  Since most people are very familar with Excel or Google Sheets, I decided to use a spreadsheet at the database.  This family used it primary for Legos.  It helps other family members to see what legos the kids have so there are not any repeats as gifts.
